metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31616 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a local user with basic capabilities can cause an out-of-bounds read, which may lead to denial of service, or information disclosure.

notes.Note: sbeattie> windows drivers only mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-430: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
